phrs.translation: 毛皮商, 毛皮衣制作工, 古代制皮工匠的一种, 皮货商

sentences.sentence: She remembered when she went on a picnic with the old furrier family.
sentences.translation: 她记得她曾与老皮货商一家野餐的情景。

sentences.sentence: It was the day of the ceremony when one pretty daughter of the furrier got engaged.
sentences.translation: 那天是老皮货商的漂亮女儿订婚的仪式。

sentences.sentence: "I, too, am well aware of it by the increasing preference for velvet stuffs," said the furrier.
sentences.translation: “这从天鹅绒日益发达，我也确实看出来了。”皮货商答腔说。
